title: Parsnip crisps

default: ½ parsnip, peeled and thinly sliced with a mandolin

steps: Heat a heavy bottomed saucepan, half of vegetable oil, until a breadcrumb sizzles in it. (CAUTION: hot oil can be dangerous! Do not leave unattended.)
Add the parsnip slices in batches and fry until golden.
Drain onto kitchen paper and sprinkle with salt, to taste.
